name: cursor-android-emulator-connect
description: Direct MCP tooling for controlling the Android Emulator via ADB (Android Debug Bridge).
author: Anysphere, Inc.

cursor.androidEmulator.enabled.description: Enable Android Emulator MCP tools for agent interaction with Android apps

cursor.androidEmulator.dockedView.fps.description: Target frame rate for the docked emulator view (5-60 FPS)
